name: adonous-tech-hello-alexa-skills

scripts.deploy-skill: npm run private-get-skill && npm run private-deploy-manifest && npm run private-deploy-model && npm run private-deploy-isp && cd ./lambda/custom && npm run update-lambda-code
scripts.deploy-skill-no-isp: npm run private-get-skill && npm run private-deploy-manifest && npm run private-deploy-model && cd ./lambda/custom && npm run update-lambda-code

author: acquiknowledge
description: Serverless application package for Alexa Skills built with ASK CLI and ASK SDK V2 and TypeScript
